Start a game and get into the world map, just before entering Chaos Shrine.

00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF
You can do that by selecting "Browse this memory region" on the address,
selecting the byte (ends in D68) in the bottom part of the window and pressing CTRL+V.
The other "MultiplayerBlocked" addresses should be changed now.
Finally change MissionCount at the bottom of the cheat table to 150.

Also change the addresses "Bahamut", "Gilgamesh", "Lufenia", "BahamutMenu" and "Exchange(Map)" to 1
to unlock the difficulties and other essentials to play through the game.
